title: Rentify
full_description: Rentify is an application for a company that provides car rental services. Here you can search cars by filters and add favourite ones to your collection.

title: Flopify
full_description: Flopify is a mobile application for sharing a photos with others. Here you can publish your pictures and comment/like images of others.

title: Phonebook
full_description: The entire (frontend and backend) application is developed by my own. The aim of this app is to practice authintification process and REST API architecture.

title: Node REST API
full_description: Backend designed for a web application dedicated for managing phone contacts. Main features: utilizing MongoDB, abillity to attach avatar, enabling user registration via email.

title: Goose Track

title: Ice Cream
full_description: Ice Cream is a web application for an ice cream business. It allows a visitor to fully get aquanted with a range of products.

title: Houzz
